H0.text: What type of rock is formed from lava. Magmatic

H1.text: What type of rock is formed from lava. Volcanic

H2.text: What type of rock is formed from lava. Magmaic

H3.text: What type of rock is formed from lava. Igneous

A4.text: Lava â€“ When molten rock erupts and solidifies on the Earth's surface, it forms coherent volcanic rocks such as basalt, andesite, and rhyolite.

A5.text: The sub-family of rocks that form from volcanic lava are called igneous volcanic rocks (to differentiate them from igneous plutonic rocks).
